name: solopdf-cli
description: A fast PDF manipulation CLI tool powered by Rust and Node.js

scripts.build: npm run copy-rust-core && tsc && npm run finalize-build
scripts.build:ci: npm run copy-rust-core:ci && tsc && npm run finalize-build
scripts.copy-rust-core: mkdir -p src/rust-core dist/rust-core && cp ../rust-core/index.js ../rust-core/index.d.ts ../rust-core/index.node src/rust-core/ && cp ../rust-core/index.js ../rust-core/index.d.ts ../rust-core/index.node dist/rust-core/
scripts.copy-rust-core:ci: mkdir -p src/rust-core dist/rust-core && cp ../rust-core/index.js ../rust-core/index.d.ts ../rust-core/index.node src/rust-core/ && cp ../rust-core/index.js ../rust-core/index.d.ts ../rust-core/index.node dist/rust-core/
scripts.prepublishOnly: pnpm clean && pnpm lint && pnpm test && pnpm build
